RESOLVED_ENTITIES.this circuit: United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Court of Appeals for the F: federal court reviewing the case of roving border patrol agents' stops, with precedents applied in a principled way
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Mexico/United States border: geographical boundary relevant to the case and location of the incident, 115 miles south of the stop in Texas

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Texas: location where the defendant was stopped, 115 miles north of the Mexico/United States border
